strings.subscriptionWeeklyDigestDescription: Select to get a weekly compilation of emergency events based on your preferences.
strings.subscriptionNewEmergenciesDescription: Select to receive notifications for new emergency events (includes Field Reports, GDACS alerts and WHO Alerts).
strings.subscriptionNewOperationsDescription: Select to receive notifications of new IFRC supported emergency operations.
strings.subscriptionRegionalNotificationsDescrip: Select one or more regions to receive notifications about.
strings.subscriptionCountryLevelNotificationsDes: Select one or more countries to receive notifications about.
strings.subscriptionDisasterTypesDescription: Get notified about new disasters in these categories.
